data: Hi, I’m Amy  👋
So, you’re the new FinOps specialist joining us  🤝
I’m the CFO and our teams have a hard time managing our cloud costs 😥
I’m glad you’re here  to help us  😊
I’m Nick, the CEO.
You couldn’t be here at a better time  🤩
We’re about to announce 📢 our IPO and our costs are all over the place.
We need your help in ensuring we’re capturing all those rogue spends  🙋‍♂️
Let me walk you through how this is going to work.
We’ve got Amnic to help you find those rogue costs.  Watch out 👀 for them.
The rouge costs are in red and you need to TAP on them to save them.
DON’T TAP on the Green ones. Those are costs associated with doing business.
Tapping on the green ones results in freezing your systems for 5 seconds and a penalty on your score
You’ve also got a few power-up features to help you out.
Alerts, add 5 seconds to your clock.
Anomalies show you which systems not to focus on while adding 5 seconds to your clock
Recommendations will add 5 seconds to your clock and show you which systems to focus on.
Keep smashing those costs and your Amnic AI meter  gets filled up.
When the AI meter is full, it’ll take care of all the costs for you for the next 5 seconds
I want to see you on top of that leaderboard.
Your best score for each day makes it to the daily, weekly and monthly leaderboard.
And we’ve got big prizes for the leaders.
You can access this help in the menu any time you need us.
Looks like you’re all set.
Let’s smash those costs!
